titleStmt.title: An account of the original, nature, preparation, vertues, and use of the Vatican pill famous for many years past, unto this day throughout Europe, and particularly in this kingdom, for the many great and remarkable cures wrought by it / prepared exactly according to the most correct process, and recommended to publick use, by J.B. ...
titleStmt.author: J. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
